name: March Media Chicago
description:
At March Media Chicago Our Goal is Simple. We help businesses create amazing digital work and help make a statement on the Internet. Our specialties are digital marketing, local listing, website design, search engine optimization, SEM, social media strategy, and graphic design. March Media Chicago works with clients in consumer marketing, food and beverage, non-profits and others. Every client and every solution is unique.
How We Work: FOR US, IT ALL BEGINS WITH OUR EARS – paying close attention to our client's needs and the problems they encounter. Only then do we use what's between our ears. We also believe that nothing succeeds in a vacuum, which is why we make agile & collaboration a key element in each project we undertake. If you've got any questions, we'd be more than happy to sit and start using our ears.
READ MORE...
